questions.subject: Statistics II
questions.text: The distribution of the sample mean is called:
options: Frequency Distribution
Sampling Distribution
Normal Distribution
Binomial Distribution
questions.explanation: It is the Sampling Distribution of the Sample Mean.

questions.subject: Statistics II
options: We reject H0 when it is true
We accept H0 when it is true
We reject H0 when it is false
We accept H0 when it is false
questions.explanation: Type I error is a False Positive (Rejecting true Null).

questions.subject: Statistics II
questions.text: In a linear regression y = 2x + 3, if x=4, what is the predicted y?
